# n0f-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Button component for common interactions

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description         | Type                                                                          | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Disables the button | `boolean`                                                                     | `false`     |
| `size`     | `size`     | Button size         | `"icon" \| "lg" \| "md" \| "sm" \| "xs"`                                      | `'md'`      |
| `type`     | `type`     | The button type     | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"`                                             | `'button'`  |
| `variant`  | `variant`  | The button variant  | `"destructive" \| "ghost" \| "link" \| "outline" \| "primary" \| "secondary"` | `'primary'` |


## Events

| Event      | Description                        | Type                      |
| ---------- | ---------------------------------- | ------------------------- |
| `n0fClick` | Emitted when the button is clicked | `CustomEvent<MouseEvent>` |
